title: Save first, spend later
body: Put aside 10% of your income right after payday. Small but regular contributions build a financial cushion.

title: The 50/30/20 rule
body: 50% for basic needs, 30% for wants, 20% for savings and investments.

title: Plan your purchases
body: Go shopping with a list and a budget. Avoid impulse buying.

title: Track your expenses
body: Record your spending in an app. Seeing categories helps cut unnecessary costs.

title: Review subscriptions
body: Once a month, review your subscriptions. Cancel those you donâ€™t use.

title: Set financial goals
body: Clear goals (a trip, an emergency fund) increase motivation to save.

title: Avoid debt
body: Use a credit card only in emergencies. Interest quickly eats up your budget.

title: Cook at home more often
body: Homemade meals are usually cheaper. Plan your menu for the week.

title: Use cashback and discounts
body: Take advantage of discounts only for planned purchases, not just because of the discount.

title: Be consistent
body: Saving is a marathon. Regularity matters more than the size of the contributions.
